alert.note: Alert for Harding County; Quay County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 21 at 2:46AM MDT until March 22 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...North winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Quay County and Harding County. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 6 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized areas of blowing dust could develop prior to and during the onset of precipitation with areas of reduced visibility. As temperatures cool tonight, snow and areas of blowing snow may develop. Light accumulations are possible.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.
